about: I am a recently graduated IoT engineer who enjoys communication and actively engaging in problem-solving. Creativity, passion, analytical and observational skills constitute my superpowers. Apathy and lack of interest from the team towards a task are my weaknesses. Following a fulfilling one-year work experience at Genelec, I am now prepared to join a new team and embark on learning fresh insights and skills. Let's do something great together.

cv.title: Intern at Genelec
cv.description: Collaborated closely with the logistics department, focusing on the optimization of operational processes and implementing automation strategies aimed at enhancing efficiency.

cv.title: Police Officer
cv.description: Patrolled urban areas, enforced traffic regulations, assisted citizens, and responded to emergency calls.

details: Tools for International Engineering Students - Grade: S - Date: 15.12.2019
